oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial View of Downtown, 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of an aerial view of downtown Nashville, photographed by Bill Driver of the Nashville Housing Authority in October of 1965. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : color
